snp4.12:5.2: Bālomako → bālo mago (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
snp4.12:6.3: parihīnapañño → koci nihīnapañño (bj, s1-3) | kocipi nihīnapañño (mr)
snp4.12:16.2: suddhimakevalī te → suddhimakevali te (bj) | suddhimakevalīno (si, pts1)
snp4.12:18.3: medhagamāvaheyya → medhagaṃ āvaheyya (bj, s1-3) | medhakaṃ āvaheyya (pts1)
